info: The second tranche will support the development of an energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable and environment-friendly railway transport system in India by improving railway transport capacity of the railway routes financed under the investment program. The outputs of this second tranche will be the supply and delivery of track components to the construction sites ready for installation in the railway projects financed under the RSIP.
name: MFF:RAILWAY SECTOR INVESTMENT PROGRAM-TRANCHE2
